root.name: Meteos Wars
root.description: Developed by Q? Entertainment, of Lumines and Extend, Every, Extra fame, Meteos Wars is a spiritual successor to the 2006 DS game, Meteos.Â Players move coloerd blocks (called Meteos) up and down within their respective columns to match groups of three like-colored blocks to send them shooting up into the sky and off of the top of the screen.
